text: Dejan Lazarević (born 15 February 1990) is a Slovenian professional football player who plays as a winger. ==Club career== ===Jagiellonia Białystok=== On 18 January 2018, Lazarević signed a two-and-a-half-year contract with Jagiellonia Białystok. == International career == ===International goals=== :Scores and results list Slovenia's goal tally first. {|class="wikitable" |- ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !!
